name: Loop Planet
description:
Controls:

Click Place Objects :D

Planet loop is a game developed for Black and White Jam #8, is a simple game where you must save a planet from being destroyed, but this planet has the peculiarity that has a loop energy, which walks around the plant and every time the energy interacts with the elements such as turrets these acquire enough energy to perform their action (launch a missile, start a lazer or increase production).

this game was developed during a twitch livestream.:
https://www.twitch.tv/miventech_jcode
